androidx.test.internal.runner

Class TestSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.test.internal.runner.TestSize

  • public final class TestSize
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a test size qualifier which can be used to filter out tests from a test suite.

    It quietly handles runner size filter annotations and old platform size annotations.

    • Field Summary

      static TestSize NONE
      A "null object" that is returned in case no test size matches, to avoid a null return value.

        Returns:
        true if the the test size annotation is valid

      • fromString

        public static TestSize fromString(java.lang.String testSize)
        Creates a test size instance from a test size string. This method will return NONE if the test size is unknown.

      • fromDescription

        public static TestSize fromDescription(Description description)
        Creates a test size instance from a Description. This method will return NONE if the description does not contain any test size information.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
